page.title: 03Education in Stogumber
page.content: Education in Stogumber takes place in an old building which now only has{children from 5-9 years.}The building dates back to 1833 and in {1983 celebrations}took place to mark {150 years of education}in the present building.{From the age of 9}the village children attend{Danesfield } {Middle School at Williton,}which is about 4 miles away.{At 13}they go on to the{West Somerset School at {Minehead.} A few chidren attend private schools outside the village. The{school day}starts at 9:00 and ends at 3:15 with 1 hour and 15 minutes fop lunch at 12:00.All the children have lunch which is cooked at the school. There are two teachers,a secetary,a cleaner,a cook and a dinner supervisor. This school may have to close.
